Title: Magic Controls
Description: Set of Silverlight 1.1 controls. Now - standard Windows controls like Splitter, ScrollBars, ScrollablePanel. In plans - TextBox, Grid, CheckBox, RadioBox and so on.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Set of Silverlight 1.1 controls. Now - standard Windows controls like Splitter, ScrollBars, ScrollablePanel. In plans - TextBox, Grid, CheckBox, RadioBox and so on.

To get sources - use Visual Studio 2008.
  • Now this project have no sence. All will have been implemented in Silverlight 2.0
